title: Organization Contribution
description: A specific contribution by an organization to either a GOOS Mission or a WIGOS Program, playing a defined role.

targetProgram.description: The WIGOS Program to which the organization contributes.

targetMission.description: The GOOS Mission to which the organization contributes.

role.description: The role played by the organization in the contribution.

description.description: Optional free-text description of the contribution.

endDate.description: The date the contribution ended, if applicable.
